Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video clip depicts police high-handedness in dealing with protests over the controversial bill in Assam, when in reality it is an old video from Jharkhand unrelated to the protests.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a video clip without proper verification or context.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is from Assam and related to the protests over the Citizenship Amendment Bill, which is proven to be false.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations or sources of the video, leading to the false assumption that it is related to the protests in Assam.
